item.title: Train Simulator
item.description: Overview Name Train Simulator Release date August 19, 1995 Notes Multiple entries released from 1995 to 2000. Supported controllers Model Support Notes Master Controller (PC) Native Many entries require companion software to use the controller. Master Controller II (PC) Native Many entries require companion software to use the controller.

item.title: Train Simulator PLUS
item.description: Overview Name Train Simulator PLUS Release date July 19, 2000 Notes Multiple entries released from 2000 to 2001. Supported controllers Model Support Notes Master Controller (PC) Native Master Controller II (PC) Native
